# Cross sections for C2
# From the Leiden database for photodissociation and photoionization of astrophysically relevant molecules, http://home.strw.leidenuniv.nl/~ewine/photo/
# Converted from earlier Leiden database cross sections by Alan Heays 2016-02-24
# Photoionisation source: C2 P.I. CF. PADIAL ET AL. ('86)
# Lines represented with gaussian of width 1.0 nm FWHM
# wavelength: (nm)
# photoabsorption:    cross section (cm2)
# photoionisation:    cross section (cm2)
# This version has been resampled to a uniform 0.1nm grid while maintaining a constant integrated cross section (using trapezoidal integration).
# wavelength photoabsorption photoionisation
